text: a side note is that doujinshi are extremely limited releases and terribly archived, they’re some of the rarest fan works you can find. i shudder to think at people trashing theirs in shame before they can be catalogued, and how many have been lost to time.

the idea of white “social justice warriors” harassing japanese creators for their own culture and trying to impose their own standards on asian writers and artists would be hilariously ironic if it wasn’t so disgustingly racist

western twitter zoomers are trying to cancel the female character designer for phoenix wright for self publishing romantic zines about gay men. explain to me how is this not just racism and homophobia? https://t.co/2XCmbDk1a0
who's gonna tell english speakers that their zines are essentially the exact same as Japanese doujinshi
